channel.title: SCIGNE - Cloud Compute on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: [Resolved] IPHC Maintenance
item.description: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.
item.content: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.
